title: PLAZA ORB / working class husband
description: AUTHORITY: It's a working class woman's drunk husband.

dialogueTree.title: Authority: "There! Working class drunk! You kno..."
dialogueTree.text: There! Working class drunk! You know what this means, right?

links.title: You: "Case solved!"
links.text: Case solved!

links.title: Authority: "Who's Dick Mullen now?"
links.text: Who's Dick Mullen now?

links.title: You: "I am."
links.text: I am.

links.title: Authority: "Cracked it. All in a good day's wor..."
links.text: Cracked it. All in a good day's work.

links.title: You: "Wait, what did I crack exactly?"
links.text: Wait, what did I crack exactly?

links.title: Authority: "What do you mean *what did I crack*..."
links.text: What do you mean *what did I crack*? Look at how working class that drunk is!

links.title: You: "It's her husband! The missing husba..."
links.text: It's her husband! The missing husband!

links.title: Authority: "Yes. And you found him. Now go and..."
links.text: Yes. And you found him. Now go and tell the working class woman. Protect and serve, recruit!

links.title: Logic: "Didn't she repeatedly tell you her..."
links.text: Didn't she repeatedly tell you her husband isn't missing though?

links.title: Empathy: "But he *is* missing. You heard her,..."
links.text: But he *is* missing. You heard her, the worry in her voice.

links.title: You: "Give me champagne! I'm going *in*."
links.text: Give me champagne! I'm going *in*.

links.title: Authority: "There's no need for champagne when..."
links.text: There's no need for champagne when there's honour, recruit. Go and tell the working class woman what you found *right now*.

links.title: You: "This doesn't add up. I'm only makin..."
links.text: This doesn't add up. I'm only making a fool of myself.

links.title: Authority: "Do marriages make any sense? Does h..."
links.text: Do marriages make any sense? Does honour? You're not a filthy philosopher, you're an officer of law. It's time to *ace this case* and not brood over your reputation. We can deal with the perception management later.

links.title: You: "This is non-sense. [Discard the tho..."
links.text: This is non-sense. [Discard the thought.]

links.title: Authority: "Not honourable, recruit!! Not honou..."
links.text: Not honourable, recruit!! Not honourable at all.

links.title: You: "It's the future leader of a proleta..."
links.text: It's the future leader of a proletarian uprising.

links.title: Authority: "No, it's not."
links.text: No, it's not.

links.title: You: "It's... uhm... some third option?"
links.text: It's... uhm... some third option?

links.title: Authority: "No. Stop goofing around, recruit!"
links.text: No. Stop goofing around, recruit!

links.title: You: "Open and shut. I don't even need to..."
links.text: Open and shut. I don't even need to think about this anymore. Goodbye. [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
